translation.Message_0_Page_0: We have 6 achievable ranks. You start as a Cadet, then it goes Hoplite, Captain, Battalion Leader, Colonel, and finally Brigadier. After that come management seats, but they are currently all full.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Doing work for your given skill area is much more likely to get you a promotion. When that happens, report to me and I'll give you the new equipment.
